data.name: ReadAdministrativeAction
data.value: select top(1) TYPE from CKT_ADMIN_ACTION where TYPE = @type

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePersonAccount
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (TYPE = 'R')

data.name: ReadFips
data.value: select top(1) [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION, COUNTY_DESC, STATE_ABBREVIATION, COUNTY_ABBR from CKT_FIPS where (LOCATION = @location) and (COUNTY = @county) and ([STATE] = @state)

data.name: ReadObligation
data.value: select top(1) CPA_TYPE, CSP_NUMBER, OB_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, LGA_ID from CKT_OBLIGATION where (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (OB_ID = @obId) and (DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId)

data.name: ReadObligationAdministrativeAction
data.value: select top(1) OTY_TYPE, AAT_TYPE, OBG_GENERATED_ID, CSP_NUMBER, CPA_TYPE, TAKEN_DT, RESPONSE_DT, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP, RESPONSE from CKT_OBLIG_ADMIN_AC where (@otyType = OTY_TYPE) and (@obgGeneratedId = OBG_GENERATED_ID) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (@cpaType = CPA_TYPE) and (@aatType = AAT_TYPE) and (TAKEN_DT = @takenDt)

data.name: ReadObligationTribunal
data.value: select distinct T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T2.JUDICIAL_DIVISION, T2.TRIBUNAL_NM, T2.FIP_LOCATION, T2.JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, T2.IDENTIFIER, T2.FIP_COUNTY, T2.FIP_STATE from CKT_TRIBUNAL T2 join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T3 join CKT_OBLIGATION T1 on (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T1.LGA_ID) and (T3.COURT_CASE_NO = @courtCaseNo) on T2.IDENTIFIER = T3.TRB_ID

data.name: UpdateObligationAdministrativeAction
data.value: update CKT_OBLIG_ADMIN_AC set RESPONSE_DT = @responseDt, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPD_TSTAMP = @lastUpdTstamp, RESPONSE = @response where (OTY_TYPE = @otyType) and (AAT_TYPE = @aatType) and (OBG_GENERATED_ID = @obgGeneratedId) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (TAKEN_DT = @takenDt)
